messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Breastfeeding  in FL
messages.messageBody:
From: "Maggy" <isaacray@...>

<< Ditto from me. In fact, I have secrectly wished someone would try and
make me leave somewhere so I could give them a piece of my mind.

Maggy (who's not usually a confrontational type person)>>


I was just talking about this very same thing with my friend last week!!!
She came upon an older woman in the grocery store who asked my friends son
about school and what followed was not pretty. Needless to say the older
woman was not pro homeschool and my friend was trying nicely to explain. I
made the remark that why can't I ever run into anyone like that!!!!!! With
my in laws gone, I have no more good fights left!!

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: Breastfeeding  in FL
messages.msgSnippet: I have never encountered any problem here in FL with nursing anywhere in public. No one has ever said anything to more or given me anything but approving
messages.messageBody:
I have never encountered any problem here in FL with nursing anywhere in
public. No one has ever said anything to more or given me anything but
approving looks. If there were offended people, I never saw them.

Mary B

Ditto from me. In fact, I have secrectly wished someone would try and make me leave somewhere so I could give them a piece of my mind.

Maggy (who's not usually a confrontational type person)



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
